name: Anderson Pride
description: My friends describe me as being a soft, strong man with purpose and integrity. I see myself as a spiritual being having a human experience, looking at life through spiritual eyes ~ while being realistic in this crazy world.Raised my only daughters, mostly as a single papa, now have two grandchildren and loving every minute. Spent years working in business as an entrepreneur, and my passion is in the healing arts. Trained as a body therapist specializing in nutrition and spirituality (body/mind/spirit).
